caption:
“Courage is born where fear is crucified.”

Reflection:
When fear dies upon the cross of trust, courage rises in its place. The heart that surrenders becomes unbreakable.

Commentary:
This reflection teaches that courage does not deny fear — it transforms it. Faith turns dread into devotion, and trembling into triumph.
